newsitem.title: JAPAN: Square delays software launch to Jan 31.
newsitem.headline: Square delays software launch to Jan 31.

text.p: Japanese game software maker Square Co Ltd said on Friday it would postpone the launch of a new version of its game software "Final Fantasy" to January 31 from its original plan of December.
The new game software is for Sony Computer Entertainment Inc's game machine PlayStation, it said in a statement. Sony Computer is a unit of Sony Corp.
The change follows Square's decision to increase compact discs for the game from two to three.
It also said it would not change its earnings forecast for the year to next March 31 despite the delay.
